Talk_1004:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>The <clr:0000>East Wind<clr:ffff> general store is in style
and open for business!<sp:0:4:0>As part of our collaboration with Cece,
we're selling <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff>! They're a
<clr:0000>Hateno Village <clr:ffff>exclusive!
Talk_1017:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Come and get your <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff>! Only in
<clr:0000>Hateno Village<clr:ffff>, and only in collaboration
with Cece!
Talk_1018:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>You can hit the store across the way,
<clr:0000>Ventest Clothing<clr:ffff>! They're featuring
a <clr:0000>new line of hats<clr:ffff> right now!
Talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>That hat! That's a new addition to the
Cece line, isn't it?<sp:0:4:0>How'd you manage to snag it? I heard it
wasn't on the market yet.<sp:0:4:0>Isn't it just the cutest?
Talk_1019:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>Thanks to <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>, this village is the place
to be. She's drawing in so many tourists
that our sales are going up too!<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff>'s putting our village on the map!
Talk_1008:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Is the rain getting you down? <sp:5:1:0>Well, come
in and get dry while browsing our wares!
Talk_1009:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Tired_01>*sigh* Work's done for the day. That <clr:0000>Manny<clr:ffff> guy
just keeps glaring at me...<sp:0:4:0>What's his problem?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1030:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Hm? Do you need something? I haven't
started my spiel yet.
Talk_1031:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Tired_01>*sigh* Another long day drawing in customers...
I hope <clr:0000>Manny<clr:ffff> doesn't show up today.<sp:0:4:0>That guy is always glaring at me. I don't even
know why.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1032:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Oh, are you a tourist? I haven't started
my spiel for customers yet.
Talk_1033:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Be sure to buy your Cece-brand clothes
at Ventest Clothing!
Talk_1020:
<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0400>Oops! I promoted the clothing store again!
Um. <sp:5:1:0>My dad isn't in earshot, is he?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1034:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you need something at the East Wind
general store, you'll have to talk to my
dad at the counter.<sp:0:4:0>Sorry, but I need to clean the shop.
Talk_1022:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01>Oh no, how'd I let myself get distracted?
I've got a job to do here!
Talk_1023:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>How about some <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>? It's a
gloopy, trendy, eating sensation!<sp:0:4:0>This new arrival from Hateno Pasture is an
overnight sensation in Hateno Village!
Talk_1024:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Our <clr:0000>sun pumpkins<clr:ffff>, brought to you in
conjunction with Cece, are exclusive to
Hateno Village!<sp:0:4:0>You won't find them anywhere else, so
don't pass up this opportunity to buy!
Talk_1025:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Welcome to <clr:0000>East Wind<clr:ffff>, the general store
that's always in fashion. Glad to see a
returning customer!<sp:0:4:0>Are you here for Hateno Village's famous
fresh <clr:0000>produce<clr:ffff>? Or maybe you're looking
for <clr:0000>Cece-brand<clr:ffff> clothes?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>If it's fresh <clr:0000>produce<clr:ffff> you need, step right
in! But if you want <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> stuff, then you
can find it in the clothing store over there.
Talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0500><snd:Unconscious_01><sp:0:2:2:5000>That limited-edition Cece hat really is darling...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0b01>Oh no, I can't let myself get sidetracked!
I've got a job to do here!
Talk_1000:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>The <clr:0000>East Wind<clr:ffff> general store is open
for business!<sp:0:4:0>If you're here for Hateno Village's famous
fresh <clr:0000>produce<clr:ffff>, you're in the right place!<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Or, if you like this super-cute <clr:0000>Cece<clr:ffff> hat...
Talk_1013:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're interested in <clr:0000>Hateno Village's
specialty<clr:ffff> goods, go right in!<sp:0:4:0>Or, if you like the look of this <clr:0000>Cece-
brand<clr:ffff> hat, you'll find more like it at
<clr:0000>Ventest Clothing <clr:ffff>over there!
Talk_1026:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Oh, are you a tourist? <sp:5:1:0>Sorry, but my shift
is over for today.
Talk_1027:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you need something at the East Wind
general store, you'll have to talk to my
dad at the counter.<sp:0:4:0>I'm on my way home to rest my face
muscles so I can smile more tomorrow.
Talk_1015:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting_01>Welcome to Hateno Village! Here for
some sightseeing?
Talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0400><snd:SurpriseS_01>Oops! There I go, shilling for the clothes
shop again.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01>I can hear Dad now. "Just whose business
are you promoting out there?!"
Talk_1028:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>If you need something from the general
store, talk to my dad at the counter.<sp:0:4:0>I'm heading to bed to rest my face
muscles so I can smile more tomorrow.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0a01>Ugh. That <clr:0000>Manny<clr:ffff> guy was glaring at me again.
I just want to be out of the public eye for the
rest of the day.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_1016:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Welcome to the <clr:0000>East Wind<clr:ffff> general store—
in style and in business!<sp:0:4:0>We now also stock <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>, a new
product from Hateno Pasture!
Talk_1029:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice>Hm? Do you need something? Sorry, but
my shift's over for today.
